title.rendered: SIFFCY 2023 – A celebration of good cinema, culture and values

content.rendered:
The 9th edition of Smile International Film Festival for Children and Youth (SIFFCY) showcased 150+ critically acclaimed films from more than 50 countries to an audience of over 50,000 children in Sirifort Auditorium Complex, New Delhi and simultaneously in 50+ different other locations across India.

The festival gave children the opportunity to learn from some of the most creative minds from around the world. They participated in workshops, attend masterclasses and panel discussions, and interacted with industry professionals.

Smile Foundation’s SIFFCY FilmFestival is an effort to sensitise children and youth through hand-picked quality films, with various topics starting from social/economic/gender equality to the environment, family values, friendship, aspirations, dreams, self-confidence, and the importance of education from across the globe.
